question_text: What is the main purpose of a DHCP reservation?
answer_options: To block devices from obtaining IP addresses
To assign IPs randomly from a pool
To always give the same IP to a specific device
To assign a new MAC address to a device
correct_answer: To always give the same IP to a specific device
explanation: A DHCP reservation ensures that a specific MAC address always receives the same IP address when connecting to the network.
